actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

official_title: To amend the Hate Crime Statistics Act to require the Attorney General to acquire data about crimes that manifest evidence of prejudice based on gender.
short_title: Hate Crime Statistics Improvement Act of 2003
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Hate Crime Statistics Improvement Act of 2003 - Amends the Hate Crime Statistics Act to require the Attorney General to acquire data about crimes that manifest evidence of prejudice based on gender.

titles.title: Hate Crime Statistics Improvement Act of 2003
To amend the Hate Crime Statistics Act to require the Attorney General to acquire data about crimes that manifest evidence of prejudice based on gender.
